column1: he was four years older than me
after a few months of this
okay i said okay yeah okay
his eye looks into my eye
he tries to pretend i'm not there
he tries to pretend i'm not
i'll tell them i'll tell them i will
i go and stand by the door
i make little rattly noises with the handle and the key
he tries to pretend i'm not there
i'm rattling away like mad with the handle and the key
alright he says right look that's it
he sounds like he's gonna really do for me
i'm going to be so boring
go to bed go to bed go to bed go to bed go to bed go to bed go to bed
i tried to talk to him
hey what do you want for your birthday brian
hey what do you want for your birthday
hey you got a pimple on the end of your nose you know
i'm still fiddling with the door
and i've got out of bed
fiddle riddle diddle diddle fiddle riddle diddle diddle
not taking any notice of michael
he gets to my brother's door
she gets to my brother's door
my brother is waiting for me to
my brother is waiting for me to say something i'm hoping he'll say something
says my dad getting a bit cross
oh no the moment i dread
when dad goes from being cheery to absolutely furious
in a weedy little voice i say
you promised you'd stay in bed
and there's my dad and he's roaring
would you believe it the little
would you believe it the little pig
would you believe it the little pea
i'll have to break it down
he's gonna be in for big trouble
me i'm standing there all shaky and sorry and shuddery
standing there all shaky and sorry and shuddery
but my brother what's he doing
he's smiling all over his big face
he's smiling all over his big face
